stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why the class will not compile?

features.html:
The following class definition does not compile.

 

public class Pet
{
   private String name;
   private String species;
   private int age;

   public Pet(String pName, String pSpecies)
   {
      name = pName;
      species = pSpecies;
      age = 0;
   }

   public void incrementAge()
   {
      age++;
   }

   public String getInfo()
   {
      return pName + ", " + pSpecies;
   }
}

choicesHtml: The class has three instance variables, but its constructor has only two parameters.
The instance variables should be designated  public  instead of  private.
The return type of the  incrementAge  method should be  int  instead of  void.
The  getInfo  method does not have access to variables named  pName  or  pSpecies.
